argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | #P_zaddcl | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M + N ) e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> N e. ZZ ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iddvds | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M || M ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> M || M ) |
| 6 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( M e. ZZ -> M e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_zcn | |- ( N e. ZZ -> N e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_pncan | |- ( ( M e. CC /\ N e. CC ) -> ( ( M + N ) - N ) = M ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( M + N ) - N ) = M ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> M || ( ( M + N ) - N ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dvdssub2 | |- ( ( ( M e. ZZ /\ ( M + N ) e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ M || ( ( M + N ) - N ) ) -> ( M || ( M + N ) <-> M || N ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 10, 11 | #P_syl31anc | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || ( M + N ) <-> M || N ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_bicomd | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( M + N ) ) ) |
